companies.description: Sahaj is an artisanal software engineering firm that focuses on transforming businesses and delivering impact by combining software engineering, AI & ML, platform & data engineering. The company's core philosophy is that bold outcomes stem from simplicity, and they pursue crafting purpose-built solutions to drive data-led transformation for organizations. Their name is derived from Sanskrit, meaning natural, original, innate, and spontaneous. They operate using first principles thinking and lean cohesive teams to provide simple, elegant solutions while ensuring full knowledge transfer so that there is no dependency on Sahaj. The company has set up and grown a presence in Hyderabad and works with clients globally to deliver transformational outcomes. They emphasize craftsmanship in software engineering, combining deep technical expertise with a focus on business value. Their approach involves no roles or hierarchy in teams, fostering a collaborative environment where expertise flows naturally. Sahaj's services span across multiple domains including platform engineering, data engineering, and artificial intelligence and machine learning implementation. They also provide advisory services for tech due diligence and tech assessment, helping organizations evaluate technology risks and opportunities. Through their purpose-built solutions, they help organizations navigate complex technical challenges and drive meaningful business transformation.
companies.location: Austin, TX (8911 N Capital of Texas Hwy, Suite 4200, Austin, TX 78759) and Hyderabad

solutions_offered.value: Advisory (Tech Due Diligence and Tech Assessment)

use_cases.value: Technology risk management through Tech Due Diligence
Software engineering craftsmanship for organizational goals

companies.description: Saab is a global defense and security company founded in 1937. The company's mission is centered on the belief that it's a human right to feel safe and helping to protect people. They provide a state-of-the-art product portfolio for air, land, naval, and security domains. The company describes itself as being at the forefront of technology, in a challenging and ever-changing environment. Their operations are fueled by conscious choices, increased presence in strategic markets together with international partnerships and a strong focus on innovation. With 26,100 employees worldwide, Saab operates globally, delivering advanced defense systems and security solutions. The company's portfolio includes early warning and control aircraft like the GlobalEye, signals intelligence ships equipped with cutting-edge SIGINT capabilities, remote weapon stations such as the Trackfire RWS, and advanced missile defense systems including the RBS 70 Bolide. Saab also develops submarines, fighter jets, and next-generation radar detector systems that incorporate machine learning and AI technologies. Their cyber security solutions protect critical infrastructure and national security interests. The company combines decades of aerospace and defense expertise with modern technologies including radar, machine learning, and artificial intelligence to create comprehensive security solutions for nations worldwide.
companies.location: Bröderna Ugglas gata, SE-581 88 Linköping, Sweden

solutions_offered.value: GlobalEye Early Warning and Control (AEW&C) aircraft

use_cases.value: Early warning and control for air defense
Remote weapon station operations for defense materiel administration

companies.description: ScribePT provides an AI Scribe Tool for therapy-focused clinical documentation. Its primary mission is unburdening the clinicians by reducing documentation time and allowing more time for patient-centered care. The service is purpose-built for physical therapy (PT), occupational therapy (OT), and speech-language pathology (SLP) but is customizable and configurable to meet the needs of a wide range of healthcare disciplines. It aims to elevate the quality of documentation from an administrative burden to documentation that supports the goal of simultaneously respecting the patient's clinical narrative and optimally informing other medical professionals and insurance companies. The company highlights its 25 years of experience building SaaS solutions for some of the largest companies in the world. ScribePT is used in clinics coast to coast across more than 40 states. The platform integrates with over 50 EMRs (Electronic Medical Records systems), making it highly adaptable to existing clinical workflows. It enables therapists to be present in session without being tethered to their computer, using voice-activated technology to capture clinical interactions. The AI scribe can generate narratives for evaluations, progress notes, and comprehensive documentation for 1-on-1, full 60-minute sessions. Users report that ScribePT reduces documentation burden by 95%, allowing clinicians to focus on delivering high-quality patient care rather than administrative tasks.

solutions_offered.value: AI Scribe Tool For Therapy-Focused Clinical Documentation

targeted_industries.value: Rehabilitation Therapy (Physical Therapy, Occupational Therapy, and Speech-Language Pathology)

companies.description: SmartSpotter provides retail intelligence and store presentation solutions to help companies make smarter decisions and maximize their sales. The company uses a crowdsourced network of thousands of Spotters who act as the eyes and ears on the shop floor to measure whether agreements between retailers and suppliers are being fulfilled. Their mission is to help clients know structurally what is going on at the retail level, allowing them to take action via a real-time dashboard to optimize product presentation, improve mutual cooperation, and guarantee higher turnover. SmartSpotter operates internationally across various countries including the Netherlands, Australia, Belgium, Colombia, Croatia, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, New Zealand, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, and the United Kingdom. The platform provides comprehensive retail audit solutions including shelf monitoring for stock availability and planogram compliance, promotion tracking for main bay and second placement monitoring, retail media verification for POS materials and digital advertising, price trend analysis and comparison of offline prices with receipts, mystery visits to assess total visit experience and staff compliance, and merchandising services for placing POS material and corrective actions. The company leverages photo, video, and audio evidence gathering tools combined with real-time dashboards to provide actionable insights that help retailers and suppliers optimize their in-store execution and competitive positioning.

technologies_used.value: Photo, video, and audio evidence gathering tools

solutions_offered.value: Shelf: Stock availability and Planogram compliance
Promotions: Main bay and Second placement monitoring
Retail media: POS materials and Digital advertising verification
Price: Price trends and comparison of offline price with receipts
Mystery visits: Total visit experience and staff compliance
Merchandising: Placing POS material and corrective actions

use_cases.value: Verifying if promotional materials are correctly displayed
Identifying empty shelves or missing products
Ensuring agreements regarding product range are structurally fulfilled
Monitoring competitor activity on the shop floor

companies.description: Sparkling Logic provides SMARTS™, a data-powered decision management platform that empowers data-minded organizations of all sizes worldwide. The company's mission is to help organizations intuitively automate, manage, and continuously improve key decisions in daily business operations and customer interactions. The platform is designed to leverage existing data to author and manage business rules and decision flows without heavy lifting from IT and translate complicated data, workflows, and decision logic into visualizations and user interfaces that non-technical users can configure, audit, and modify without code. SMARTS™ enables organizations to automate key decisions through a comprehensive suite of capabilities including rules authoring, low-code/no-code interfaces, AI & ModelOps, and decision analytics. The platform supports hybrid AI decision automation, allowing organizations to interconnect decision management with predictive models and machine learning tasks. It provides decision analytics through dashboards, simulations, and alerts to derive actionable intelligence from AI. Sparkling Logic serves industries such as healthcare and financial services, with notable clients including Equifax. The platform's lifecycle management capabilities ensure that decision logic can be continuously monitored and optimized, while its technical architecture supports scalability and integration with existing enterprise systems.
companies.location: Sunnyvale, California (640 W California Ave Ste 210 Sunnyvale, CA, 94086-3624)

use_cases.value: Automating key decisions in daily business operations and customer interactions

companies.description: SIS International Research is a full-service Global Market Research and Strategy Consulting firm with over 40 years of industry experience. The company aims to help Fortune 500 and fast-growing companies get real answers that drive revenue decisions and turn market uncertainty into your competitive advantage. They offer a combination of traditional market intelligence and AI-driven platforms to provide in-depth insight into the global marketplace, delving deep into consumer patterns, preferences, and motivations to provide actionable insights that drive growth and innovation. Their mission involves providing data-driven strategic guidance and utilizing cutting-edge methodologies and advanced analytics to uncover trends, behaviors, and opportunities. Headquartered in New York City with on-the-ground offices worldwide, SIS International offers comprehensive services including consumer and B2B market research, healthcare market research, strategy consulting, financial technology (FinTech) strategy consulting, and artificial intelligence business solutions. They provide in-person and online focus groups, branding and advertising services including digital advertising, content curation, event marketing, and influencer marketing. Their AI capabilities include real-time competitive tracking, predictive forecasting, market dynamics and trend studies, assessment of customer needs, AI opportunity reality checks, custom AI roadmaps, and ROI projections for AI investments. SIS International serves diverse industries including food and beverage, hospitality, personal care, travel and tourism, retail, automotive, B2B services, non-profit, legal services, healthcare, construction, engineering, industrial, technology, and financial institutions.
companies.location: Headquartered in New York City and with on-the-ground offices worldwide

use_cases.value: Car Clinics for the automotive industry

companies.description: Sparkout Tech Solutions is an enterprise software development company founded in 2017 by four passionate founders. The company describes itself as a top AI agent development company that focuses on automation that fuels real results. Their mission is to empower businesses around the world with the right tech and help businesses of all sizes digitally transform their operations. They offer a wide range of services including custom software development, AI and machine learning solutions, blockchain technology, and digital product design. They aim to eliminate repetitive tasks, boost productivity by 35%, reduce manual work, and effortlessly scale your business with confidence. The company is a team of 100+ happy professionals with experts in multiple tech stacks and industry use cases, operating with offices in the United States and India. Sparkout Tech provides comprehensive AI services including AI strategy and consulting, AI chatbots and virtual assistants, custom AI and ML model development, generative AI and LLM integration, predictive analytics and forecasting, computer vision and NLP, smart contract development, custom blockchain solutions, dAPP development, token development, custom software development, app modernization, UI/UX development, team augmentation, MVP development, quality engineering, web and mobile solutions, DevOps, and spatial computing (AR/VR). They have developed innovative products like Eatzilla for order and delivery management, Rentalslew for rental management, TransGenie for AI traceability, intelligent document understanding AI, enterprise chat applications, and HRMS development.

companies.description: SunTec.AI describes itself as The Only AI Team You'll Ever Need, providing tailored AI solutions designed to solve real-world problems and drive growth. The company focuses on building smarter, resilient AI systems designed for tomorrow's enterprises, end-to-end. Their core mission involves unifying your data foundation and operationalizing AI with integrity, compliance, and business alignment. They offer a full lifecycle of services from strategic AI consultation and custom development to seamless integration and MLOps for continuous monitoring, optimization, and scalability. The company highlights its commitment to quality and security as an ISO 27001:2022 certified company and CMMI Certified Company that is HIPAA Compliant. With a team of 850+ data and AI specialists, SunTec.AI provides comprehensive solutions across generative AI for content creation and intelligent enterprise workflows, AI and machine learning with end-to-end consulting, development, and MLOps, data and AI operationalization with compliance and business alignment, data analytics with predictive analytics, dashboards, and AI-powered business intelligence, and data annotation with human-in-the-loop labeling for text, image, audio, video, and 3D sensor data. The company serves multiple industries including finance, eCommerce, IT & Tech, healthcare, manufacturing, media, marketing, real estate, and automotive with use cases ranging from automating repetitive tasks and AI-driven qualitative survey response mapping to intelligent legal document processing using OCR and predictive maintenance with visual inspection in manufacturing.

companies.description: Simbo is an Enterprise Gen AI platform for autonomous applications designed for business processes automation without human intervention. It is described as a perfect combination of LLM and symbolic knowledge bases for hallucination free Gen AI platform for enterprise applications. The platform emphasizes security, controllability, and auditability, using a symbolic knowledge base which can be audited and modified by humans unlike opaque vector databases. Its mission is to provide a reliable and hallucination-free Gen AI platform by balancing creativity versus hallucinations and ensuring responses are not random. The platform utilizes proprietary Lossless NLU (Natural Language Understanding), symbolic RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation), vector databases, exact search, and similarity search to create a robust enterprise-grade AI solution. Simbo's primary focus is on medical practice automation to reduce physician and staff burnout while improving patient care. The platform enables business processes automation without human intervention through fact checking to ensure that hallucinations can be detected and corrected. By combining symbolic knowledge bases with LLM capabilities, Simbo provides enterprises with a Gen AI platform that maintains high accuracy, transparency, and reliability while delivering autonomous application capabilities for healthcare and other enterprise use cases.

use_cases.value: Business processes automation without human intervention
Medical Practice Automation to reduce physician and staff burnout while improving patient care
Fact checking to ensure that hallucinations can be detected and corrected

companies.description: Sekuen is described as a boutique AI agency dedicated to delivering cutting-edge technology services and products. The company specializes in building AI IP, scientific R&D, particularly in Biotech, and providing Go-To-Market (GTM) strategies with video AI. Their mission involves creating a long-term collaboration with our clients to explore new areas and build new products and delivering practical, high-impact AI solutions that solve real-world problems. They offer end-to-end tech delivery, from ideation and strategy to implementation and support. The company operates with fully remote managed teams and offers products and operations in Italy, USA, UAE, and KSA. Sekuen provides a comprehensive range of AI services including AI consulting, Biotech AI R&D, AI video marketing, staffing with fully remote managed teams, fundraising with strategic support for pre-seed, seed, and series A, and AdTech & MarTech for customer acquisition, appointment setting, and lead generation. Their product portfolio includes machine learning solutions for automated trading, license plate info extractors, smoke, fire, and bullying detection systems, conversational database querying, AI-driven video marketing, and music generation from prompts. The company's expertise spans machine learning, computer vision, conversational AI, video generation from text, music generation from prompts, data science, and full stack development including frontend, backend, database, and integration capabilities.

solutions_offered.value: Fundraising (strategic support for pre-seed, seed, and series A)
Machine Learning Solution for Automated Trading

companies.description: Skool is a platform designed for creators to host communities, online courses, and membership groups. It allows users to create your own community and provides skool owners a space to build communities together. The platform facilitates monetization through monthly subscriptions and one-time fees, serving as an all-in-one hub for educational creators to get paid to change the world by integrating Skool, YouTube, and the Synthesizer Roadmap. Skool enables professional skill development through communities like The Acting Lab, sports coaching through That Pickleball School, health and wellness programs through The Lady Change, financial education through Trading For Women, and business mentorship through School of Mentors. The platform uses Stripe for payment processing and supports creators across multiple industries including e-learning, coaching, fitness, finance, entertainment, hobbies, self-improvement, and entrepreneurship. One notable community on Skool is the AI Automation Society, which focuses on no-code AI automations to build the systems that will shape the future of work. This demonstrates Skool's role in hosting and facilitating AI-related education and community building, particularly around workflow automation and no-code AI implementation. The platform provides discovery marketplace for communities, affiliate programs, and comprehensive support services to help creators build and scale their online educational businesses and membership communities.

Sundog Education is an online training provider that aims to help students update your tech skills and turbocharge your career with Frank Kane. The company provides hands-on technical training to over one million students around the world. Their mission is focused on helping learners learn AI Engineering, Machine Learning, Data Engineering, Interview Prep, and more. They offer a variety of learning resources including hands-on activities, quizzes and practice exams, certificates of completion, and exclusive community forums with a focus on preparing students for professional certifications and real-world technical roles. The platform offers comprehensive online technical courses, the Sundog Mega Bundle, AWS certification preparation materials, practice exams, study guides, and career transition resources such as Mastering the System Design Interview and From Engineer to Technical Manager: A Survival Guide. Students can prepare for AWS certifications including AI Practitioner, Generative AI Developer, Machine Learning Engineer Associate, and Data Engineer Associate. The company's course offerings cover a wide range of technologies including AWS, Claude Code, GPT, Elasticsearch, Logstash, Beats, Kibana, Hadoop, MapReduce, HDFS, Spark, Pig, Hive, HBase, MongoDB, Cassandra, Flume, Redis, Python, TensorFlow, Scala, Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, Redshift, Glue, Athena, OpenAI SDK, AgentBuilder, Keras, and OpenCV. Use cases include career advancement and retraining, building Big Data platforms, developing agentic AI solutions, creating recommender systems, and building computer vision applications for autonomous cars.

use_cases.value: Building computer vision applications for autonomous cars

companies.description: Semantic Scholar is described as a free, AI-powered research tool for scientific literature that allows users to search 232,120,258 papers from all fields of science. The project aims to make scientific reading more accessible and richly contextual and advocates for Green AI, stating that creating efficiency in AI research will decrease its carbon footprint and increase its inclusivity as deep learning study should not require the deepest pockets. Semantic Scholar provides a comprehensive search engine for scientific papers, a new and improved API for developers which includes paper search and documentation, and Semantic Reader, an augmented reader in beta. The platform serves the scientific research community by enabling efficient literature search and discovery across disciplines including neuroblastoma research, means of production studies, and countless other scientific domains. The API allows developers to build their scholarly apps with programmatic access to the vast database of scientific papers. The Semantic Reader provides an augmented reading experience that offers contextual information to make scientific reading more effective and comprehensible. By advocating for Green AI and efficiency in AI research, Semantic Scholar demonstrates commitment to sustainable and inclusive artificial intelligence development while serving academia and the broader scientific community with powerful natural language processing and document AI capabilities.

use_cases.value: Scientific reading using an augmented reader for contextual information

companies.description: SDG Group is a global consulting firm specializing in Data, Analytics, and AI. With a 30-year legacy, they describe themselves as pioneers in the realm of Data, Analytics & AI consulting who craft visionary solutions that transcend conventional problem-solving. Their mission is to empower your organization to discover Insights Beyond Analytics and guide businesses to lead the future through AI-enabled innovation. They position themselves as a technology-agnostic authority that combines technical expertise with business acumen to deliver tailor-made solutions, frameworks, and solution accelerators. The company operates with teams around the world and serves multiple industries including aerospace, insurance, automotive, pharmaceutical, fashion & optical retail, utilities, government & public sector, financial services, and consumer goods. SDG Group's technology partnerships include Orbitae (their proprietary AI platform), Google Cloud, AWS platform, Snowflake, Matillion, Dataiku, and Tableau Pulse. Their comprehensive solutions encompass artificial intelligence consulting, data strategy & governance, data & analytics, business insights & performance management, cloud migration services, frameworks and solution accelerators, advanced training & enablement, Data Dialogue (Conversational AI), and Planning Hub. Use cases span accelerated planning and control for aerospace research, transformation of management control, building new data architecture on Google Cloud, AI-powered insurance selection via virtual assistants (ASSAI), conversational AI for exploring complex data, reinventing forecasting and planning processes, cloud-based business analytics transformation, fraud detection and compliance, and optimizing utility networks and asset reliability.

companies.description: SiliconFlow provides One Platform All Your AI Inference Needs designed to run powerful AI models faster, smarter, at any scale, with predictable costs. Their mission is focused on turning AI ambition into action by providing a high-speed inference engine for text, image, video, and multimodal models. They offer developers the ability to build, explore, to create with a focus on speed, flexibility, efficiency, privacy, and simplicity through an OpenAI-compatible API. The platform utilizes cutting-edge hardware including NVIDIA H100/H200, AMD MI300, and RTX 4090 GPUs, and features a self-developed modal inference engine that is fully OpenAI-compatible. Supported models include MiniMax-M2.1, GLM-4.7, DeepSeek-V3.2, DeepSeek-R1, Qwen3-VL-32B-Instruct, and FLUX.2. SiliconFlow offers multiple deployment options including Serverless for running models instantly via API, Fine-tuning for customizing models with one-click deployment, Reserved GPUs for guaranteed GPU capacity and stable performance, Elastic GPUs for flexible FaaS deployment, AI Gateway for unified access with smart routing and cost control, Inference & Deployment for optimized end-to-end inference, and Train & Fine-Tune for data processing and performance tuning. Use cases span coding with code understanding, code generation, inline fixes, real-time autocomplete, structured edits and syntax-safe suggestions; agent systems with multi-step reasoning, planning, tool-using and executing workflows to handle complex tasks; RAG for retrieving relevant information from knowledge bases enabling accurate, real-time responses; content generation for text, image and video generation, social media content creation, analytical report generation; AI assistants for workflows, multi-agent, customer support bots, document review, data analysis; and search with query understanding, long-context summarization, real-time answers, personalized recommendations, and actionable insights delivery.

Multi-step reasoning, planning, tool-using and executing workflows
Retrieving relevant information from knowledge bases
Text, Image and Video generation, social media content creation
Workflows, multi-agent, customer support bots, document review, data analysis
Query understanding, long-context summarization, real-time answers, personalized recommendations

The company drives innovation and digital transformation with industry-specific engineering services where top-tier software solutions guide your business through every project phase, adding value at each step. companies.description: SAY IT Labs provides game-based interventions for speech and reading by harnessing artificial intelligence to listen, interact, and adapt to the user. The company aims to transform how students learn by blending the immersive power of video games with the rigor of pedagogy and AI. Their mission is to provide a tech-forward approach to foundational skills that allows kids to learn through play not pressure, effectively redefining what education and speech therapy looks like in the 21st century. The company was developed by graduates of the world-renowned Digital Arts and Entertainment school in Belgium. SAY IT Labs' flagship product is Stutter Stars, the first voice-controlled video game designed specifically for children who stutter. They also offer an all-in-one platform for personalized speech practice, speech games for articulation and literacy, and automatic reports to offer immediate insight into a user's strengths and challenges. The platform utilizes artificial intelligence, speech recognition technology, voice-activated tools, and procedural randomness to create engaging learning experiences. Use cases include personalized speech practice for every student, early literacy lessons, phonemic awareness activities, speech and sound practice for articulation disorders and apraxia of speech, and voice-controlled intervention for children who stutter. SAY IT Labs serves both education sectors with classrooms and teachers, and healthcare with speech therapy practices, providing innovative solutions that reduce the pressure on students while improving outcomes in speech development and literacy acquisition.

solutions_offered.value: All-in-One Platform for personalized speech practice
Speech games for articulation and literacy

use_cases.value: Personalized Speech Practice for Every Student

companies.description: Doxis, branded as The Document Intelligence Company, provides an enterprise content management (ECM) platform that turns your content chaos into insight. Their mission is to automate processes and empower your organization to work intelligently, efficiently and securely on a single, trusted platform. The company focuses on digital transformation by helping organizations work better, faster and more securely through the digitization, understanding, and automation of documents and business workflows. They offer tailored solutions for your digital transformation and were named a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant. The platform is powered by the latest AI and includes capabilities for Doxis Intelligent Content Automation, Enterprise Content Management (ECM) system, Intelligent Document Processing (IDP), and SAP document automation expertise. Doxis solutions encompass document management, team collaboration, intelligent archiving, process automation, content understanding, connecting business apps through connectors, consulting and implementation, managed services, and Doxis Academy training. Doxis serves industries including manufacturing, bank & financial services, insurance, and logistics, providing comprehensive document intelligence and workflow automation solutions.

companies.description: TeamLogic IT is a managed IT services provider that has been operating for more than 18 years. Their mission is to help businesses stay safe, productive and profitable through the smart use of technology. They follow a People First. Tech Next philosophy, providing a complete spectrum of IT solutions ranging from strategic guidance and 24/7 proactive monitoring to help desk support. The company operates as a national network of local offices, offering both fully managed IT and co-managed services to businesses of all sizes to address technology challenges and reduce IT overhead. Corporate headquarters is located in Southern California with local offices including Oklahoma City, OK and Kansas City, MO. TeamLogic IT is one of the fastest growing Managed IT Services organizations in the nation with a national network of highly diversified and friendly technicians. companies.description: Google Skills is a technical learning platform designed to help users build AI skills for tomorrow, today and future proof your skills on Google's new learning platform built for you. The platform provides training, credentials, and community resources focused on artificial intelligence and cloud computing. Its mission is to be a trusted partner in navigating the new reality of AI innovation. It offers hands-on learning through paths such as Learn AI, Become an innovator, Train your team, and Get credentialed. Whether you're all-in on AI, just want to brush up on the latest, or you're here to skill up your team — get ready for the latest innovations with the technical experts behind Google Skills. The platform utilizes Google Cloud, Vertex AI, Gemini (Google's advanced language model), Vertex AI Studio, AutoML, BigQuery ML, Streamlit, TensorFlow, Imagen, Cloud Run, Cloud Shell, Docker, and Python SDK. Google Skills offers learning paths, courses, skill badges, career certificates, and Google Cloud certifications. Specific programs include AI Boost Bites and the Google Cloud Innovators program, which provides 35 monthly credits for hands-on learning. companies.description: Spiceworks is a professional network and resource hub for the IT industry, described as being for everyone and everything IT. The company provides a multi-faceted platform that includes a professional community, technical news and insights, market research, and free IT management software. Their mission is to provide a space where millions of IT pros connect to share expertise, evaluate vendors, and tackle tech challenges together. They offer tech news, insights, and resources to stay informed and prepared and provide fact-based reports on tech trends to make confident business decisions. companies.description: The company focuses on guiding innovative leaders through the disruptive transitions of our time and moving from inspiration to impact. It provides expertise in strategy, innovation, and leadership development through keynote speaking, consulting, and master classes. The mission involves empowering leaders across business, nonprofit, or government with innovative mindsets, actionable strategies, and transformative tools to drive the future of their organizations, communities, and society. The work is grounded in Dr. Kaplan's Wall Street Journal bestsellers, award-winning expertise, and decades of cross-sector experience. The company offers keynote speaking, strategy & innovation consulting, leadership development programs, master classes covering consulting, change management, innovation, and strategy, and books including Experiential Intelligence, The Invisible Advantage, and Leapfrogging. Services incorporate AI-powered future tools, AI for idea generation, AI-powered culture transformation, and digital tools & templates for strategy and innovation. Use cases include corporate meetings & events to conferences and trade shows, achieving breakthroughs in even the most complex challenges, fostering cross-functional and cross-sector collaboration, managing transformational change, and embedding innovation into culture. The company serves corporate, nonprofit, public sector (government), healthcare, and education sectors with specific clients including technology companies like 3M and Amazon Web Services, healthcare organizations like HCA Healthcare, Cigna, and American Nurses Association, consumer goods companies like Colgate-Palmolive, Hershey's, and Gatorade, and media companies like NBCUniversal and PBS.

solutions_offered.value: Master Classes (Consulting, Change Management, Innovation, Strategy)

use_cases.value: Corporate meetings & events to conferences and trade shows

companies.description: Scorebuddy provides AI-Powered Call Center Quality Assurance Software designed to provide 100% QA coverage at half the cost using a human-in-the-loop approach. The platform allows users to use configurable AI to auto-score 100% of conversations, speed up QA workflows, and surface insights. Their mission is to drive cost-efficiency, engage agents, and deliver loyalty-building CX every time by augmenting human QA processes with GenAI to analyze every interaction, identify skill gaps, and provide targeted coaching. Serving 300+ contact centers and scaling for teams of less than 50 agents or 5,000+, Scorebuddy is ISO27001 certified and provides comprehensive quality assurance solutions. The platform utilizes GenAI Auto Scoring, Business Intelligence (BI) tools, Learning Management System (LMS), and integrations with major platforms including Genesys, Intercom, Amazon Connect, Nice CXone, Zendesk, and Salesforce. Solutions offered include GenAI Auto Scoring, customizable scorecards, automated workflows, integrated coaching, built-in LMS, personalized dashboards, embedded AI, business intelligence, and compliance & security. Use cases include auto-scoring human and AI agents across multiple channels, automatically analyzing 100% of customer conversations, reducing human evaluation times with AI assistance, analyzing customer sentiment and finding reasons to call, identifying skill gaps, and delivering training courses. Scorebuddy serves contact centers and call centers across various sectors including Fintech (Tide, ID.me), Logistics (DHL), Insurance (Allianz), Retail (Teleflora), and Gaming (Sky Betting & Gaming), providing AI-powered conversation analytics with sentiment analysis capabilities.

technologies_used.value: Integrations with Genesys, Intercom, Amazon Connect, Nice CXone, Zendesk, and Salesforce

use_cases.value: Auto-score human and AI agents across multiple channels
Reduce human evaluation times with AI assistance
Analyze customer sentiment and find reasons to call

companies.description: Technical Leaders is a coaching and training program designed to help technology professionals and leaders integrate AI into their business operations and transition from technical roles to business leadership or consultancy. The company aims to help members go beyond ChatGPT with AI workflows and bridge the gap between a technical, critical mindset and the mindset, skills, and confidence needed to finally get going. They offer a structured program with three weekly tracks: Launch for tactical and strategic support, Mental Fitness for tackling self-doubt and imposter syndrome, and Leadership & Scale for strategic thinking and scaling. The community has joined 6500+ tech leaders and provides comprehensive support including AI Maturity Level Assessment (L1-L5), AI Skills Operating System™ Guide, personalized AI roadmaps, weekly live workshops, mastermind sessions, Fractional CTO playbooks, and three coaching tracks. Specific technologies mentioned include MCPs, Agents, RAG, AI Workflows, ChatGPT, and LinkedIn for growth systems. Use cases include building MVPs in days, not months, systematizing workflows first for maximum leverage, building a Fractional CTO offer, starting a software consultancy, and reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks. Technical Leaders serves the technology, startups, SMBs, non-profits, and venture-backed teams industries. The program focuses on AI-related capabilities including LLM Agents & RAG (MCPs, Agents, RAG), Automation & Workflow (AI Workflows, top 3 workflows to systematize), and Conversational AI (referenced via ChatGPT workflows).

use_cases.value: Building MVPs in days, not months
Systematize workflows first for maximum leverage
Reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks

companies.description: SAS is a provider of Data and AI Solutions and is described as the most trusted data and AI partner. The company provides domain-driven, purpose-built AI designed to grow top-line revenue, improve operational performance and reduce risks. Their primary platform, SAS Viya, is designed to provide unmatched speed and productivity and fulfills the promise of trusted AI. The company focuses on delivering clear and transparent insights through packaged, IP-rich solutions that accelerate and sustain value. SAS Viya includes SAS Viya Copilot, SAS Viya Workbench, and integration with Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Red Hat OpenShift. The platform supports machine learning, real-time decisioning, and edge-to-enterprise platforms. Solutions offered include SAS Viya, SAS Viya Copilot, Fraud Solutions, IoT Solutions, Marketing Solutions, Risk Solutions, SAS Models, and data integration software platforms. Use cases span detecting and preventing fraud across channels, transforming IoT data into actionable insights, delivering hyper-personalized experiences in marketing, optimizing risk management across financial institutions, strategic capital optimization, streamlined regulatory reporting, and AI-powered predictions for connected devices. SAS serves industries including financial institutions for risk and fraud management, retail for marketing/MarTech, manufacturing and consumer goods (Barilla, Georgia Pacific), non-profits (World Wildlife Fund), and FinTech (Treezor), stating it serves small businesses to large enterprises. AI-related capabilities include LLM Agents & RAG (SAS Viya Copilot), Automation & Workflow (domain-driven workflows), AI Ethics & Governance (Responsible AI and trustworthy AI), Conversational AI (SAS Viya Copilot), Edge AI & IoT (Edge-to-enterprise analytics), Natural Language Processing (GenAI), Predictive Analytics (AI-powered predictions), and Recommendation Systems (hyper-personalized marketing experiences).

use_cases.value: Detect and prevent fraud across channels
Transform IoT data into actionable insights
Optimize risk management across financial institutions

companies.description: Simplex Inc. describes itself as a professional group well-versed in business and technology and a true technology partner that leads business to success. The company provides end-to-end solutions by taking responsibility for strategy to design, development, and operation/maintenance. Their approach, referred to as the Simplex Way, involves a team of professionals acting as players to support Digital Transformation (DX). They leverage extensive expertise in mission-critical system construction supporting core operations of financial institutions and financial service development that brings new user experiences. Simplex utilizes technologies including Cloud, AI, web3, Blockchain, NFT, Metaverse, Crypto assets, Flutter, DevOps, Agile development, Microservices, API infrastructure, and RPA. Solutions offered include financial services development, UI/UX design, cloud, consulting, AI/data utilization (Artificial Intelligence), and web3 covering crypto assets, metaverse, and NFT. Use cases span mission-critical system construction for financial institutions, DX promotion for public and private sectors, business strategy formulation, and rapid launch of financial services. Specific application tags include remote work monitoring, revenue analysis, personal asset management, risk management, regulatory compliance, paperless transition, DAOs, DeFi, GameFi, Stablecoins, Wallets, STO, and CFD. Simplex serves industries including entertainment, banking, securities, insurance, FX, crypto assets, construction, public, and manufacturing. AI-related capabilities include Artificial Intelligence, AI/Data Utilization, and Automation & Workflow (RPA). The company provides AI solutions that respond to all needs as an immediate force, from strategy formulation to business implementation.

use_cases.value: Mission-critical system construction for financial institutions
DX promotion for public and private sectors

companies.description: As part of World Wide Technology, we are a software and cloud-focused IT solutions provider that equips people to be engaged, connected and creative at work, and organizations to be agile, innovative, and secure by delivering AI-powered cloud and digital workplace solutions. Through our mission, we unleash the potential in people and technology to unlock value for our customers as we guide them through their transformation journey with comprehensive end-to-end solutions. Softchoice partners with major technology providers including Microsoft, Cisco, Google Cloud, VMware by Broadcom, Lenovo, and Amazon Web Services (AWS). The company offers AI-powered cloud and digital workplace solutions, Softchoice SAM+ Hub (self-serve subscription software management tool), AI & Data consulting framework, Public Cloud and Modern Infrastructure, Software Asset Management (SAM+ service suite), Modern Workplace solutions, Security platformization, and Zero Trust Modular Implementation Service. Use cases include data center modernization where customers partner with Softchoice to modernize their environment, reduce inefficiencies, and build a scalable foundation for future AI innovation; application & data modernization where Softchoice utilized AI tools to craft a customer's new chatbot including mapping and formatting data domains and crafting an easy-to-use dashboard that allowed agents to better engage with customers; and security consolidation where partnering with Softchoice enabled a customer to consolidate, strengthen security, cut costs, and modernize workflows for future AI adoption. The company focuses on AI-related capabilities including Conversational AI (chatbots), Automation & Workflow (modernizing workflows for AI adoption), MLOps & Infrastructure (AI-powered cloud and infrastructure for AI innovation), and Generative AI (Microsoft 365 Copilot experts).

solutions_offered.value: AI-powered cloud and digital workplace solutions

companies.description: SCITEPRESS is a publisher dedicated to the dissemination of scientific and technical research. They specialize in publishing conference proceedings and academic papers across various fields of science and technology. The platform hosts a digital library containing thousands of papers and hundreds of proceedings, facilitating access to research for authors and affiliations worldwide. SCITEPRESS publishes 1,200 proceedings with 64,700 papers from 152,200 authors and 121,200 affiliations. The platform covers multiple fields including cloud computing, web information systems, sensor networks, telecommunications, software engineering, and data engineering. Solutions offered include proceedings publication, research papers digital library, Insticc Ontology, and paper/proceeding indexing services. Use cases span academic research dissemination, conference publication management, scientific citation/indexing, and research affiliation tracking. SCITEPRESS serves industries including academia, scientific research, engineering, biomedical engineering, information technology, and higher education. The platform covers AI-related fields including Artificial Intelligence (8064 papers), Computer Vision, Visualization and Computer Graphics (4939 papers), Pattern Recognition (3999 papers), and Knowledge-Based Systems (4384 papers).
companies.location: Avenida de S. Francisco Xavier, Lote 7 Cv. C, 2900-616 Setúbal, Portugal

companies.description: sarmap is a Swiss company founded in 1998. The company's mission is to develop and provide innovative, sophisticated yet simple customized Earth Observation solutions, dedicated to the generation of digital information of Earth system, ensuring technical advantages and economical benefits. It describes itself as being at the forefront of technology while building on values of reliability and long-term collaboration partnerships based on mutual trust and respect. Its core activities involve the development of specialized software for processing remote sensing data to generate standard and customized products. sarmap utilizes technologies including SARscape, Opticalscape, Earth Observation (EO) data, Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) data, and remote sensing data processing algorithms. Solutions offered include SARscape software, Opticalscape software, Topography solutions, Land Displacement monitoring, RIICE, EPM, TRANSPARENTFOREST, Flooding Map Tool, and Velocity Estimation tools. Use cases include generating digital information of the Earth system, providing legal evidence in investigations and proceedings related to international law (EVIDERI project), generating flood maps with ease, and determining the speed of objects or displacements via velocity estimation. sarmap serves industries including remote sensing and geospatial analysis, environmental monitoring, legal and international investigations, agriculture (RIICE), and forestry (TRANSPARENTFOREST). AI-related capabilities include Computer Vision (processing and analyzing Earth Observation and remote sensing imagery) and Predictive Analytics (velocity estimation and land displacement monitoring).

use_cases.value: Generating digital information of the Earth system
Providing legal evidence in investigations and proceedings
Determine the speed of objects or displacements via velocity estimation

companies.description: SoftFile is a document management company that has been providing services to corporate and government clients since 1988. They specialize in document imaging, data entry, and business process outsourcing (BPO). The company describes itself as one of the leading document management companies in the Western United States and focuses on a mission of trust, quality, and value. They offer a unique blend of technology and highly trained labor to assist you with your day-to-day business operations as well as special projects. Their production facility in Sacramento converts millions of documents, maps and microfilm to digital images for viewing on networks, intranets and the web. SoftFile utilizes automated data capture methods, manual dual-blind-key process, custom data validation queries, look up tables, data formatting, and custom queries. Solutions offered include document imaging, document scanning, data entry services, business process outsourcing (BPO), and document management. Use cases include converting documents, maps, and microfilm to digital images, capturing data from forms and business documents, creating digital images for viewing on networks, intranets, and the web, and custom data validation to ensure 99.9% accuracy. SoftFile serves industries including corporate, government agencies (specifically State of CA agencies), Fortune 500 companies, and local businesses. AI-related capabilities include Document AI (document imaging and automated data capture) and Automation & Workflow (automated methods for capturing data and custom validation queries).

use_cases.value: Converting documents, maps, and microfilm to digital images
Capturing data from forms and business documents
Creating digital images for viewing on networks, intranets, and the web
Custom data validation to ensure 99.9% accuracy
